duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to a project focused on a real business need in the supply chain, creating value for Georgia-Pacific and Koch Industries.
Work alongside employees to solve real problems and offer insights that benefit society through improving products and services.
Participate in networking events, case studies, and the Innovation Challenge as part of the internship program.

education_certification.credential: Enrolled in a Supply Chain, Business, Logistics, Procurement, or Production/Operations degree or alternative program. (e.g., 2-year technical college program, certificate program, upskilling program, etc.) Eligible for full-time employment on or before Summer 2025. Legal authorization to work permanently in the United States for any employer without requiring a visa transfer or visa sponsorship.
